Scatter.description: Interactive scatter diagram set to hypothesis as default

ScatterChart.notEnoughData: Not enough data to display a chart

HypothesisScatterChart.hypothesisCorrelationDescription: Represents the correlation described in the document

AxisSelector.primaryMark: this selection for the axis conveys the primary information

ScatterStatisticOutput.label: List of statistics based on scatter output
ScatterStatisticOutput.notEnoughData: Not enough data to perform statistic operations

PrimeSymptomList.GraphHeading: Shows prime symptom appearing earlier as the set who survive increases

PrimeSymptomHistogram.factoredBy: {{ariaName}} with non fatal columns factored by {{factor}}
PrimeSymptomHistogram.name: Prime symptom bar graph
PrimeSymptomHistogram.numberExplanation: NB: this graph always counts from the first entry made, therefore filtering may return numbers that don't immediately make sense
PrimeSymptomHistogram.primeSymptomHistogramTools: Tools and feedback to interact with the graph

FactorToggle.ariaLabel: Factor toggle button: currently {{state}} click to toggle to {{altState}}

AntiBiasToolKit.secondaryNav: Secondary nav for selecting which error simulation to look at

BiasedJudgementSim.summary: Repeatedly, and randomly each time, assumes ~50% of my assessments turn out to be incorrect

BiasedTimingSim.summary: Assumes poor timing, with interactive percentage to define how far off I am

BiasedCorrelationSim.summary: Alters the correlated values randomly up or down limited to button value

TimeLineStatChart.subHeading: Basic timing statistics, across common responses and with interactive cross referencing
TimeLineStatChart.secondaryNav: See response time statistics or interactive where you can choose what to group and see time statistics about

GeneralResponseTimeLineStatChart.GraphHeading: Filterable ranges and basic statistics for both agonal and recovery responses

InteractiveTimeLineStatChart.GraphHeading: Interactive stat list allowing the user to choose what is grouped and see the timing stats for those groups

TimeLine.secondaryNavSumAndFilterList: A set of options for the months

ErrorList.calcInteractiveTimeBarArgs: data to calcInteractiveTimeLineBarStatList must be an array and current user choices must be strings
ErrorList.calcScaleToFitUI: calcScaleToFitUI requires scale argument with numeric properties stepDivision and totalSteps
ErrorList.calcWidth: calcWidth function requires a min and max value provided
ErrorList.fnMustBeProvidedTo: {{fnName}} must be provided to {{caller}} and must be a function
ErrorList.generalResponseTimeBarDataIsArray: General stat list calc needs an array for data
ErrorList.graphBlockLengthInvalid: histogramBarGroupList is not correct in {{callingFn}} - receiving: {{typeOf}} | {{val}}
ErrorList.graphBlockLengthZero: histogramBarGroupList has length 0, there should be something in histogramBarGroupList for {{callingFn}}
ErrorList.makeWidth: makeWidth requires a min and max value provided
ErrorList.mapToTimeLineBars: mapToTimeLineBars needs data with length and an i18nBase
ErrorList.noHistogramData: This histogram config has zero results
ErrorList.primeSymptomHistogramBarGroup: Prime symptom graph block list must be an array with positive count
ErrorList.secondaryNavProps: all four args are required, currentPanel, k and i18nBase are all strings and setCurrentPanel should be a function
ErrorList.userChoiceStatMapper: userChoiceStatMapper needs a string for currentResponse
ErrorList.utilKeyPairXYMakeMapFn: makeMapFn needs both x and y to refence the correct keys in each point

StoryBook.secondaryNavSumAndFilterList: Storybook secondary nav sum and filter list
